name: ss-script

x
# How does this work? This is a simple Express app built in Node.js that accepts ShareX's **Custom Uploader** files and saves them in ./uploads/. Using this, you can make screenshots upload to a custom domain immediately. *Note: You need your own domain and web hosting for this to work. I am only providing the script.* # How do I set this up? It's, actually, easier than you'd expect!
author: Awex
